backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining content, gallery, enquiries, profiles, and admin session logic with access control and storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented admin-auth and error-handling features with related files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file mapping frontend source paths to short functional summaries for each component or hook.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining light/dark theme CSS variables and base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point providing root mount element and loading the main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application router setup with page routes, admin-guarded route, and theme provider.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminFloat: Floating action button that opens the admin login modal.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminLogin: Modal for admin username/password login with sanitized error handling and redirects on success.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminRoute: Route guard that handles admin auth validation, errors, and login prompts before rendering protected content.
frontend/src/components/admin/analytics/: Displays placeholder analytics cards and a dashboard section indicating future analytics features.
frontend/src/components/admin/contact/Co: Provides a form to view and update contact details with save handling and validation.
frontend/src/components/admin/content/Co: Manages content sections with create, edit, delete, search, and merged default/backend section logic.
frontend/src/components/admin/enquiries/: Lists enquiries with read, delete, and detail view functionality, sorted by submission date.
frontend/src/components/admin/gallery/Ga: Allows creating, editing, and deleting gallery items with image uploads and category selection.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Shows a modal prompting new authenticated users to enter and save their name for profile setup.
frontend/src/components/forms/EnquiryFor: Form component for submitting enquiries, handling validation, API submission, and success UI state.
frontend/src/components/home/GalleryPrev: Displays up to six active gallery items with fallback images and a link to the full gallery.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders site footer with logo, quick links, contact details, and social media icons.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Responsive site header with navigation links, mobile menu, and active route highlighting.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Wraps the site with header, footer, tracking, admin button, and profile setup modal.
frontend/src/content/defaultContent.ts: Defines default content sections for various pages, including home and about text blocks.
frontend/src/hooks/adminSessionStore.ts: Session store managing admin auth token with sessionStorage persistence and listener updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and refreshing backend actor instances based on identity and admin token.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminAuth.ts: Combines admin session and actor state to expose admin authentication status and actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminSession.ts: Manages admin session tokens with validation, error handling, and sync via a shared store.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/usePageViewTracking.t: Tracks page views reactively and sends analytics events via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend CRUD operations in React Query hooks for content sections, gallery items, and related data.
frontend/src/hooks/useSiteContent.ts: Fetches published content sections and falls back to default content when missing.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind-based theme variables, dark mode colors, transitions, and global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Displays multiple about‑related content sections using site content hooks.
frontend/src/pages/AcademicsPage.tsx: Renders academic information sections pulled dynamically from site content.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Provides an admin dashboard with tabbed management tools for content, gallery, enquiries, and contact details, plus logout handling.
frontend/src/pages/AdmissionsPage.tsx: Renders the admissions page with dynamic content sections, a prospectus download button, and an admission enquiry form.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays contact details, an optional embedded map, and a contact enquiry form using fetched backend data.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Shows a filterable gallery of active images by category with tab navigation and preview cards.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Builds the homepage with dynamic hero content, feature highlights, program summaries, testimonials, and a gallery preview.
frontend/src/utils/errorMessage.ts: Converts unknown or technical error messages into safe, user‑friendly English strings with specific rule-based mappings.
frontend/src/utils/siteNavigation.ts: Defines the site's navigation links and includes a helper to remove duplicate link entries.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash-based), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from the URL or storage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining dark mode, content paths, extended color tokens, animations, and enabled plugins.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current state, known issues, and feature requests focused on fixing admin login and session validation logic.
